name: Curve Boosts sBTC Strategy
description: This vault takes your deposited token and turns it into {{token}} by supplying liquidity on [Curve Finance](https://curve.fi/). {{token}} tokens are then staked in the gauge on Curve to earn PNT and enhanced CRV rewards thanks to Yearn's [locked CRV boosts](https://resources.curve.fi/guides/boosting-your-crv-rewards). Rewards are swapped for one of the underlying assets and resupplied to the liquidity pool to obtain more {{token}} tokens.
